title: AG60094: Seed Technology - Quick Facts
text:
AG60094
Course name | Seed Technology
Offered by | Agricultural & Food Engineering
Credits | 4
L-T-P | 3-1-0
Previous Year Grade Distribution
EX A B C D P F | EX | A | B | C | D | P | F
EX | A | B | C | D | P | F
Semester | Spring

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Seed multiplication with reference to production and harvesting of hybrid, composite and improved varieties of crops, seed certification, seed processing with reference to drying, cleaning, processing and treatment of seed packaging, post harvest control of insect, pest and fungi in storage, packaging, seed testing, seed germination and vigour, maintenance and distribution of breeders seed, foundation seed and certified seeds.
